---
output:
  word_document:
    reference_docx: anGBtemplate.docx
params:
  MApopdat: ''
  MAmethod: ''
  AOInm: ''
  pcfilter: ''
  spcd: ''
  photofn: ''
  photo_author: ''
  title.ref: ''
  totals: ''
  
---


```{r Params, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
 
library(data.table)

MApopdat <- params$MApopdat
MAmethod <- params$MAmethod
AOInm <- params$AOInm
pcfilter <- params$pcfilter
spcd <- params$spcd
photofn <- params$photofn
photo_author <- params$photo_author
title.ref <- params$title.ref
totals <- params$totals


```


```{r Data_Inputs, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

if (is.null(title.ref)) {
  title.ref <- AOInm
}

## Get states in MApopdat or that pcfilter
states <- MApopdat$states
invyrs <- unique(unlist(MApopdat$invyrs))

if (!is.null(pcfilter) && 'STATECD' %in% names(MApopdat$pltcondx)) {
  pltcondf <- datFilter(MApopdat$pltcondx, xfilter=pcfilter)$xf
  states <- pcheck.states(unique(pltcondf$STATECD))
  invyrs <- unique(pltcondf$INVYR)
}

if (is.null(pcfilter)) {
  title.statesx=title.states <- NULL
  title.filter <- NULL
} else {
  title.statesx <- paste(states, collapse=" and ")
  title.states <- paste0(", ", paste(states, collapse=" and "))
  title.filter <- AOInm
}
invyrs2 <- paste0(min(invyrs), "-", max(invyrs))
stcd <- pcheck.states(states, statereturn="VALUE")

## Check species
#ref_codes <- ref_codes
if (is.null(spcd)) {
  spcd <- 746
} else {
  if (!all(spcd %in% ref_codes[ref_codes$VARIABLE == "SPCD", "VALUE"])) {
    stop("spcd is invalid")
  }
}
title.spcd <- paste(ref_codes[ref_codes$VARIABLE == "SPCD" & ref_codes$VALUE %in% spcd, 
                              "MEANING"], collapse = " and ")
spcd.filter <- paste0("SPCD %in% c(", toString(spcd), ")")


## Photo text
photo_text <- ""
if (!is.null(photofn)) {
  if (!is.null(photo_author)) {
    photo_text <- paste0(photo_text, " Photo courtesy of ", photo_author, ".")
  }
}

## Set estround and pseround
estround <- ifelse(totals, 2, 3)
pseround <- ifelse(totals, 0, 2)


```

title: "Forest Resource Report:  \n`r AOInm``r title.states`,  \n`r invyrs2`"

# Summary

&nbsp;  

```{r Summary_Info, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
 
estsummary <- modMAarea(MApopdat=MApopdat, MAmethod=MAmethod, 
                      landarea="ALL", pcfilter=pcfilter, 
                      rowvar="COND_STATUS_CD", colvar="RESERVCD", 
                      table_opts=list(row.FIAname=TRUE, 
                                      col.FIAname=TRUE,
                                      totals=totals))

rowest <- estsummary$raw$unit_rowest
colest <- estsummary$raw$unit_colest
totest <- estsummary$raw$unit_totest

title.rowvar <- "Land class"
title.colvar <- "Reserved status"

unitarea <- MApopdat$unitarea
if ('STATECD' %in% names(unitarea)) {
  unitarea <- unitarea[unitarea$STATECD %in% stcd,] 
}
areapop <- sum(unitarea[[MApopdat$areavar]])
areapopf <- totest$est

area.for <- rowest[rowest[[title.rowvar]] == "Forest land", "est"]
area.nf <- rowest[rowest[[title.rowvar]] == "Nonforest land", "est"]
area.water <- sum(rowest[rowest[[title.rowvar]] %in% c("Noncensus water", "Census water"), "est"])

unitvars <- c(MApopdat$unitvar, MApopdat$unitvars)
unitlut <- setDT(MApopdat$unitlut)
if ('STATECD' %in% names(unitlut)) {
  unitlut <- unitlut[unitlut$STATECD %in% stcd, ]
}
nplotspop <- sum(unitlut[, sum(n.total, na.rm=TRUE), by=unitvars][["V1"]])
nplotspopf <- totest$NBRPLT.gt0


intro_text1 <- paste0("The area of ", AOInm, " is ", format(round(areapopf), big.mark=","), " acres with ", round(area.for/areapopf * 100), " percent of the area classified as forest land, ", round(area.nf/areapopf * 100), " percent classified as nonforest land, and ", round(area.water/areapopf * 100), " percent as water. The area intersects ",
        length(states), " states (", toString(states), ").")


addtext <- "The estimates are based on state-level population data"
if (is.null(pcfilter) || pcfilter == "") {
  addtext <- paste0(addtext, ". ")
} else {
  addtext <- paste0(addtext, ", filtered by ", pcfilter, ". ")
}
addtext2 <- paste("There are a total of", format(nplotspop, big.mark=","), 
                  "FIA plots within the population")
if (is.null(pcfilter) || pcfilter == "") {
  addtext2 <- paste0(addtext2, ". ")
} else {
  addtext2 <- paste0(addtext2, " with ", nplotspopf, " plots inside the area of interest. ")
}

intro_text2 <-
paste0("Estimates are calculated using the Forest Inventory ESTimation and Analysis (FIESTA) R package (Frescino et al. 2015) and are based on estimators from the mase R package (McConville et al. 2018). Data for this report were extracted from the Forest Inventory and Analysis (FIA) database for years ", invyrs2, " (Burrill et al. 2018). ", addtext, addtext2, "All percent sampling errors are reported at 68% confidence level.")




```


`r intro_text1`

`r intro_text2`

# EST1 - Number of live trees (>= 1.0 in dia) by forest type group table.


-----  


Table 1. Number of live trees (>= 1.0 in dia) by forest type group, `r AOInm``r title.states`, `r invyrs2`.

&nbsp;    

```{r EST1_Table, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

estdat_EST1 <- modMAtree(MApopdat=MApopdat, MAmethod=MAmethod,
                      landarea="FOREST", pcfilter=pcfilter, 
                      estvar="TPA_UNADJ", estvar.filter="STATUSCD == 1 & DIA >= 1.0", 
                      rowvar="FORTYPGRPCD", 
                      returntitle=TRUE,  
                      table_opts = list(row.FIAname=TRUE, 
                                        estround=estround, 
                                        pseround=pseround,
                                        totals=totals), 
                      title_opts = list(title.filter=title.filter))

estdat_EST1_raw_rowest <- estdat_EST1$raw$unit_rowest

EST1 <- subset(estdat_EST1_raw_rowest, select=c("Forest-type group", "est", "pse"))

EST1 <- setnames(EST1, c("Forest-Type Group", "Estimate", "Percent Sampling Error"))

knitr::kable(EST1, "simple", align=c("lrr"), digits=c(0,2,0),
             format.args=list(big.mark = ","))

```  

&nbsp;    


-----  


# EST1 - Number of live trees (>= 1.0 in dia) by forest type group barplot.


-----  


&nbsp;    

```{r EST1_Barplot, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=7.5}

anMOD_barplot(estdat_EST1, barplot.row=TRUE, 
                      barplot.nplt=TRUE, barplot.ord=NULL)
```
